item.description:
Online special for a 3-hour introductory diving class at the MIT swimming pool for $40! This is normally $75, so its a super deal!

You MUST buy your voucher online in the next 5 days. go here to purchase:

http://www.buywithme.com/i/a5we42msnpm5b?utm_source=GYFLI&utm_medium=Social

RSVP-ing to this event does not gaurantee you a spot, you must FIRST purchase your voucher. After you purchase your voucher, RSVP yes to this event. Once the purchase period for the vouchers expires, those of us who got one can decide on which class day we would like to go to.

If there are enough of us...I can call the place and make sure they can reserve a spot for us.

**MAKE SURE AND BUY YOUR VOUCHER***
item.why: It looks like a lot of fun!
item.name: Learn to Scuba Dive!
